title: Instead of "Prisioner Island" for trolls. "Rising Tide" for honorable players. Please back this
body:
Would it be nice to be put in a special queue of honorable players that have been positive so long they get lifted up to a level where they can play with like minded people. I would have wanted this more than the free skin I got. Of course I got an Alistar skin so it was like not getting one at all. This is extended positive reinforcement. I have never been banned, if you haven't perhaps we would enjoy playing on the same team without wondering, "do you suck or are you trolling?" You know I am just having a bad game cause I don't consistently suck enough to be suspected of being a troll. It would be like having good credit. Build it up to 700 and you get into a Honorable Tier. 

I can't see a down side except from someone that thinks a special club for good people that bad people can't get into is a bad thing. **There aren't enough trolls to keep you from rising!** Leaves the trolls be. We will rise above it just like we always do.

Special ICON that shows in team builder and and champion select for all queues. Not the honorable banners those are nonsense cause you can lose them for unknown reasons that deal with how many games you play. If I have a credit card with a 700 credit score, my score doesn't drop and my card doesn't get closed if I only buy one thing a year. Honor shouldn't fall off based on games played. Your honor rating should rise every time you play a game that doesn't result in multi reports. It will go up even faster when you are honored. It is not measured by an average of how many games you play. You could get into EXALTED TIER within 30 games. If you are a troll you will drop out just as fast. 

Instead of a skin for good behavior give me serenity and a GG.  "Congratulations summoner! Due to good behavior in an abundance of games you have been promoted to the EXALTED TIER!"


EDIT: 

1. States of being: Troll\toxic, unskilled\too casual, normal 50\50,  Honorable, and EXALTED. You are not simply troll or not. 

2. It has been suggested that playing with other EXALTED/HONORABLE should be an optional queue in the "possible" event that there would be few in the pool resulting in long wait times. 

3. And honors placement doesn't happen until after level 20 at least.

So the honor thing you mention w/ ribbons and credit scores is kinda a bad analogy if you aren't actually advocating for prisoners' island w/ a different name.

Your credit score doesn't go down because it doesn't matter how many people have good credit. Bad credit is actually pretty similar as an example to prisoners' island. The problem isn't that you lose points for not playing enough, the issue is that other players who play more EARN more points. If you create an honor que that is a priority/restricted to the nicest people for access, then it has to be a smaller percentage of the player base so that the normal que still has enough people that the majority of normal que will be neutral or positive players (although not as positive as honor que).

To do this means that you are looking at an X% restriction rather than a score>X restriction. If good credit was considered the top 5% of credit scores for instance it would not stay static at being good if you're over 700. If people as a whole raised their credit scores, then the new cut off might be 750 or 800. Similarly the ribbon system is based on the top 20% (I believe, but don't quote me on that number) of people with those honors. If you play less you have less opportunity to earn honor, and so when people move up and pass you, the ribbon goes away because you no longer meet the minimum qualification even though your score didn't go down.  For an honor que to work, it would have to look like the ribbon system, because if you set an X minimum score instead of an X% minimum score, than eventually a majority of the community could work to build up enough points to meet the minimum X points required. At that point normal que becomes a low priority prisoners' island where the only people left are new players who just joined, and trolls who will make it difficult to build up honor/positive points as a new player and thus new players are locked into a more toxic que until they can work to get out by making more progress than was required of the previous players who left already. The only way to prevent this is to limit honor que to the top X% instead of a static number, which means that even if you don't get punished or do anything negative you could drop out of honor que privileges because someone below you improved their score and out ranks you now. While I get the sentiment that you want to be able to match with positive players, it could not be based off of the qualifications that were required for stuff like the mystery skin (ie not getting reports, generally being positive) because 95% of players (or something stupid like that) received that skin. Allowing everyone who met that standard to jump ship isn't creating a higher tier option in addition to normal que and low priority, it's just making normal que a permanent low priority que.
